column4: you can have both running - if it's interfaces afaik networkmanager should ignore - but yes there are more than one place or way an interface can get up'd
is it smb client? or are you running a samba server from there?
ok - that may happen if you don't have permissions to see whats open on it also in which case you can try to prefix it with sudo - can you pastie the file and its permissions?
